mbx.attributes.balloon.halloween_candy_p: A sweet pumpkin full of candy smiling a bit too wide, like it knows something you don't.
mbx.attributes.balloon.lny_snake.lore: A floating tribute to the Wood Snake, gliding through the sky with wisdom. May it bring fortune… or judgment.
mbx.attributes.balloon.lny_snake.title: Lunar Snake Balloon
mbx.attributes.balloon.name: Balloon
mbx.attributes.balloon.pack_alpha_full.l: You supported the server during alpha. A real hero or someone with too much free time.
mbx.attributes.balloon.valentine_heart.l: A heart-shaped balloon floating with love… or helium. Just don't let go, or your romance might drift away.
mbx.attributes.balloon.xmas_tree.lore: Festive, flashy, full of cheer. Just try not to float too close to ceiling fans.
mbx.attributes.balloon.xmas_tree.title: Christmas tree
mbx.attributes.emote.box.lore: Why fight when you can aggressively jump in place? Gym bro approved.
mbx.attributes.emote.box.title: Box Jump
mbx.attributes.emote.cooking.lore: What's in the pot? Don't ask. Don't smell. Just run.
mbx.attributes.emote.cooking.title: Suspicious Stew
mbx.attributes.emote.crossed_arms.lore: Ultimate power stance. Judging silently. Probably disappointed.
mbx.attributes.emote.crossed_arms.title: Crossed Arms
mbx.attributes.emote.flip.lore: Totally unnecessary, but undeniably cool. 10/10 would flip again.
mbx.attributes.emote.flip.title: Backflip
mbx.attributes.emote.flying_head.lore: When the stress hits just right and your head bails first.
mbx.attributes.emote.flying_head.title: Losing Your Head
mbx.attributes.emote.gnome.lore: You've been GNOMED! Tiny menace with a tune. 100% cursed.
mbx.attributes.emote.gnome.title: Gnome
mbx.attributes.emote.guitar.lore: Strums softly under the moonlight, summons emotions, or boredom, depending on the audience.
mbx.attributes.emote.guitar.title: Acoustic Vibes
mbx.attributes.emote.handstand.lore: Look ma, no feet! Blood rushing to the brain, but worth the flex.
mbx.attributes.emote.handstand.title: Handstand
mbx.attributes.emote.kiss.lore: For allies, enemies, and total strangers. Consent optional.
mbx.attributes.emote.kiss.title: Blow a Kiss
mbx.attributes.emote.large_gap.lore: Physics? Never heard of it. Crossing the void in style. Try not to miss.
mbx.attributes.emote.large_gap.title: Leap of Faith
mbx.attributes.emote.marry_me.lore: Love is in the air. So are commitment issues. Better say yes.
mbx.attributes.emote.marry_me.title: Marriage Proposal
mbx.attributes.emote.meditation.lore: Floats in peace, ignores responsibilities, and taxes.
mbx.attributes.emote.meditation.title: Enlightenment
mbx.attributes.emote.military_walk.lore: Discipline. Honor. And absolutely no rhythm. Left, no—right!
mbx.attributes.emote.military_walk.title: March
mbx.attributes.emote.name: Emote
mbx.attributes.emote.nature_aura.lore: Leaves swirl, birds sing, and allergies attack. Green and dramatic.
mbx.attributes.emote.nature_aura.title: Nature's Aura
mbx.attributes.emote.possessed.lore: Floats mid-air, screams internally, and has zero chill.
mbx.attributes.emote.possessed.title: Possessed
mbx.attributes.emote.puddle.lore: Stares at rats jumping in water. Religious experience. You wouldn't understand.
mbx.attributes.emote.puddle.title: Puddle Watcher
mbx.attributes.emote.rat_dance.lore: Tiny rat. Big moves. Unholy energy. Pure vibes. You're welcome.
mbx.attributes.emote.rat_dance.title: Rat Dance
mbx.attributes.emote.rich.lore: Bathes in gold, flexes on peasants, still broke emotionally.
mbx.attributes.emote.rich.title: Filthy Rich
mbx.attributes.emote.rock_aura.lore: Levitates. Rocks float. Ultimate badass mode. Environment not included.
mbx.attributes.emote.rock_aura.title: Stone Cold Aura
mbx.attributes.emote.sit.lore: Sometimes you just gotta plop down and question everything.
mbx.attributes.emote.sit.title: Sit
mbx.attributes.emote.skull_aura.lore: You gathered all the legendary skulls. Now you float like a god, and smell like one too.
mbx.attributes.emote.skull_aura.title: Divine Aura
mbx.attributes.emote.slavic_dance.lore: Hardbass intensifies. Squat like babushka watching. Adidas sold separately.
mbx.attributes.emote.slavic_dance.title: Slav Squat Dance
mbx.attributes.emote.spinner.lore: Channel your inner Beyblade. Zero friction. Infinite style.
mbx.attributes.emote.spinner.title: Head Spinner
mbx.attributes.emote.tpose.lore: Assert dominance. Bugs fear it. Players respect it.
mbx.attributes.emote.tpose.title: T-Pose
mbx.attributes.emote.wave.lore: Friendly? Maybe. Mocking? Probably. You decide.
mbx.attributes.emote.wave.title: Wave
mbx.attributes.emote.zombie.lore: Braaaains… and terrible posture. Mondays, basically.
mbx.attributes.emote.zombie.title: Zombie Shuffle
mbx.attributes.nameplate.demonic_azure.l: Blue, edgy, and totally not overcompensating for something. Probably cursed. Definitely cringe.
mbx.attributes.nameplate.golden_devileye: See the truth, the lies, and your browser history. Burns brighter than your future.
mbx.attributes.nameplate.golden_flag.lor: Wave it with pride, or just to distract enemies. Spoiler: it doesn't work.
mbx.attributes.nameplate.golden_skull.lo: Looks expensive. Isn't. But hey, bling is bling.
mbx.attributes.nameplate.hammer.lore: Perfect for fixing nails, breaking bones, and solving arguments.
mbx.attributes.nameplate.hammer.title: Hammer of Subtlety
mbx.attributes.nameplate.heart.lore: Full of love, hope, and cholesterol. Handle with emotional gloves.
mbx.attributes.nameplate.heart.title: Heart
mbx.attributes.nameplate.map.lore: Leads to treasures, traps, or your ex's house. Mostly disappointment.
mbx.attributes.nameplate.map.title: Ancient Map
mbx.attributes.nameplate.name: Ornament
mbx.attributes.nameplate.skull.lore: Show off your loyalty with this hilarious ornament! A tiny skull hovers above your character. Spooky-cute!
mbx.attributes.nameplate.skull.title: Vote
mbx.attributes.nameplate.skull_upgrade.l: Now 15% more terrifying, 25% more useless, and 100% skull.
mbx.attributes.nameplate.sub.lore: You're the best supporter! This ornament proves it. Bragging rights included.
mbx.attributes.nameplate.sub.title: Sub
mbx.attributes.nameplate.sword.lore: Sharp pixels only. Looks cool, does nothing. Just like your PvP skills.
mbx.attributes.nameplate.sword.title: Sword Icon
mbx.attributes.nameplate.volcan.lore: Hot, furious, and likely to explode at family dinners.
mbx.attributes.nameplate.volcan.title: Volcanic Rage
mbx.attributes.profile_plate.evil.lore: Smiles like they set your spawn in lava. Wears black... and guilt. Builds lairs, not bases.
mbx.attributes.profile_plate.evil.title: Evil Plate
mbx.attributes.profile_plate.love.lore: Hearts everywhere. Boundaries nowhere. Sends signs with 'uwu' on them. Probably built a shrine. To you.
mbx.attributes.profile_plate.love.title: Love Plate
mbx.attributes.profile_plate.name: Profile plate
mbx.attributes.profile_plate.plant.lore: Grows on you. Like mold. Talks to crops. They talk back. Composts drama into status.
mbx.attributes.profile_plate.plant.title: Plant Plate
mbx.attributes.profile_plate.rainbow.lor: Subtle as a fireworks dispenser. Every color, no consistency. Style over substance. But lots of style.
mbx.attributes.profile_plate.royal.lore: Logs in like it's a coronation. Too noble to mine manually. Builds castles, judges huts.
mbx.attributes.profile_plate.royal.title: Royal Plate
mbx.attributes.profile_plate.sub.lore: Flashes your loyalty. Might be gifted, won't say. Flexes without spending.
mbx.attributes.profile_plate.sub.title: Sub Plate
mbx.attributes.profile_plate.temple.lore: Sacred? Maybe. Extra? Definitely. Thinks lighting candles adds XP. More decorative than useful. Like you.
mbx.attributes.profile_plate.tropical.lo: Too chill to tryhard. Plays barefoot, probably. Smells like sunscreen and ego.
mbx.attributes.tag.halloween_ghost.lore: Came back from the dead to spread happiness around or haunt you.
mbx.attributes.tag.halloween_ghost.title: sBOOky
mbx.attributes.tag.lny_snake.lore: Wise, elusive, and ever-watchful. You walk the path where patience meets fortune and cunning.
mbx.attributes.tag.lny_snake.title: Lunar Wood Snake
mbx.attributes.tag.name: Tag
mbx.attributes.tag.pack_alpha_basic.lore: Early to the party and still the life of it, you set sail before it was even a thing.
mbx.attributes.tag.retro_ticket.lore: For those who obtained the alpha ticket during the Christmas event on the founders' old server.
mbx.attributes.tag.retro_ticket.title: Alpha Ticket
mbx.attributes.tag.valentine.lore: Hopeless romantic or loot hunter? Either way, your heart's on your sleeve or at least in your tag.
mbx.attributes.tag.valentine.title: The Heartstruck
mbx.attributes.tag.xmas_hipster.lore: Celebrates Christmas ironically. Wore Santa hats before it was cool. Might still be doing it.
mbx.attributes.tag.xmas_hipster.title: The hipster
mbx.attributes.title.abyss_explorer.lore: Breathes pressure and madness, got lost for weeks underwater, still found loot somehow.
mbx.attributes.title.alpha_og.lore: Level 10 in alpha? You're an OG, no doubt about it.
mbx.attributes.title.alpha_og.title: Alpha OG
mbx.attributes.title.aspiring_adventurer: Still figuring out which end of the sword is the stabby one.
mbx.attributes.title.bamboo.lore: He breathes in chlorophyll, exhales pandas. The stick chose him.
mbx.attributes.title.bamboo.title: Bamboo God
mbx.attributes.title.beetroots.lore: Nobody eats them, but you farmed them. That's... something.
mbx.attributes.title.beetroots.title: Beetroot God
mbx.attributes.title.cactus.lore: Touched every spike, smiled through the pain. Definitely bleeding.
mbx.attributes.title.cactus.title: Cactus God
mbx.attributes.title.carrot.lore: Vision 20/20, social life 0/10. Heir to Bugs Bunny.
mbx.attributes.title.carrot.title: Carrot God
mbx.attributes.title.charmer.lore: Breaks hearts with a smile. May or may not return your texts.
mbx.attributes.title.charmer.title: Charmer
mbx.attributes.title.cocoa_beans.lore: Built a chocolate empire, forgot to log out. Sweet darkness.
mbx.attributes.title.cocoa_beans.title: Cocoa God
mbx.attributes.title.cool_pirate.lore: You're a cool pirate, a very cool pirate. Certified.
mbx.attributes.title.cool_pirate.title: Cool pirate
mbx.attributes.title.crazy_voter.lore: Clicks faster than their shadow, a true maniac with a vote button. Keyboard may need therapy.
mbx.attributes.title.crazy_voter.title: Crazy voter
mbx.attributes.title.crowned_head.lore: Wears a crown, does nothing, sits while others quest, gets the credit anyway.
mbx.attributes.title.crowned_head.title: Crowned Head
mbx.attributes.title.curious_collector.l: You've started your journey, discovering hidden treasures, one curiosity at a time.
mbx.attributes.title.day_zero_hero.lore: Level 25 in alpha? You were winning before anyone else.
mbx.attributes.title.day_zero_hero.title: Day Zero Hero
mbx.attributes.title.ghostbuster.lore: If there is something strange in your neighbourhood, who you gonna call?
mbx.attributes.title.ghostbuster.title: Ghostbuster
mbx.attributes.title.kelp.lore: Lives underwater now. Speaks to algae. Has gills. Probably.
mbx.attributes.title.kelp.title: Kelp God
mbx.attributes.title.legend.lore: You've collected every skull, proof of absolute dominance, the pinnacle of power.
mbx.attributes.title.legend.title: LEGEND
mbx.attributes.title.legend_of_the_sea.l: You braved the seas, fought fish, and probably got really wet. True sea legend. Maybe.
mbx.attributes.title.lny_snake.lore: Cunning, wise, and ever-patient— this celestial serpent slithers between fate and fortune.
mbx.attributes.title.lny_snake.title: The Snake
mbx.attributes.title.master_of_evil.lore: Negotiates with demons, burns bridges for fun, smiles during world endings.
mbx.attributes.title.mega_brain.lore: Misclicked into victory, overthinks level 5 mobs, outsmarts himself daily.
mbx.attributes.title.mega_brain.title: Mega Brain
mbx.attributes.title.melon.lore: Split over 10,000. Seeds in his blood. Juice in his soul.
mbx.attributes.title.melon.title: Melon God
mbx.attributes.title.minebox_addict.lore: Votes so often they're basically part of the Minebox server code. Patch notes not included.
mbx.attributes.title.mushroom.lore: Farms both types. One edible, one illegal. Who's asking?
mbx.attributes.title.mushroom.title: Mushroom God
mbx.attributes.title.name: Title
mbx.attributes.title.nether_wart.lore: Forgot what daylight is. Sells weird potions. Highly suspicious.
mbx.attributes.title.nether_wart.title: Wart God
mbx.attributes.title.newbie.lore: Thinks armor is cosmetic, asks what DPS means, still rolls Need on everything.
mbx.attributes.title.newbie.title: Newbie
mbx.attributes.title.no_life.lore: Hasn't seen sunlight since the tutorial island. Respawns in his chair.
mbx.attributes.title.no_life.title: No-Life
mbx.attributes.title.pack_alpha_basic.lo: Early to the party and still the life of it. True pioneer in digital waters.
mbx.attributes.title.potatoes.lore: Chose the humble spud, became legend. All hail the starch.
mbx.attributes.title.potatoes.title: Potato God
mbx.attributes.title.pro_player.lore: Misses every ability, blames the lag, streams to 2 viewers anyway.
mbx.attributes.title.pro_player.title: Pro Player
mbx.attributes.title.puddle_addict.lore: Can't resist a good splash. Some say they see puddles where there are none.
mbx.attributes.title.puddle_addict.title: Puddle addict
mbx.attributes.title.puddle_genius.lore: Invented three new ways to step in puddles. Revolutionary, really.
mbx.attributes.title.puddle_genius.title: Puddle genius
mbx.attributes.title.puddle_god.lore: Controls all puddles, from small splashes to legendary lakes.
mbx.attributes.title.puddle_god.title: The Puddle God
mbx.attributes.title.puddle_master.lore: Knows every puddle by name. A true connoisseur of wet terrain.
mbx.attributes.title.puddle_master.title: Puddle master
mbx.attributes.title.pumpkin.lore: Pumpkin is love. Pumpkin is life. Pumpkin is watching.
mbx.attributes.title.pumpkin.title: Pumpkin God
mbx.attributes.title.retro_ticket.lore: Before it was cool, you were already here. Certified hipster.
mbx.attributes.title.retro_ticket.title: I was here before
mbx.attributes.title.single.lore: Alone, but thriving. And honestly, kind of loving it.
mbx.attributes.title.single.title: Single
mbx.attributes.title.sugar_cane.lore: Built a wall of sugar. Dentists fear him. Insulin cries.
mbx.attributes.title.sugar_cane.title: Cane God
mbx.attributes.title.sweet_berries.lore: Harvests pain. Eats the profits. Ouch. Again.
mbx.attributes.title.sweet_berries.title: Berry God
mbx.attributes.title.the_brawler.lore: Solves everything with fists, strategy not included, asks where the healer went after wiping.
mbx.attributes.title.the_brawler.title: The Brawler
mbx.attributes.title.the_collector.lore: You've conquered every challenge, gathered every piece, the ultimate master of collections.
mbx.attributes.title.the_collector.title: THE COLLECTOR
mbx.attributes.title.the_dps.lore: Refuses to block, refuses to heal, top damage tho.
mbx.attributes.title.the_dps.title: The DPS
mbx.attributes.title.the_encyclopedist.l: Knowledge surrounds you, pages turn with secrets, you are a living library.
mbx.attributes.title.the_machine.lore: Human or bot? We'll never know. But those votes keep rolling in. Suspiciously efficient.
mbx.attributes.title.the_machine.title: The machine
mbx.attributes.title.wheat.lore: Walks through golden fields, like some weird cereal prophet. Preaches gluten.
mbx.attributes.title.wheat.title: Wheat God
mbx.attributes.title.xmas_hipster.lore: Celebrates Christmas ironically. Wore Santa hats before it was cool. Probably owns vinyl too.
mbx.attributes.title.xmas_hipster.title: The hipster
mbx.items.adventurer_backpack.lore: Fits potions, swords, and unresolved trauma. No weight limit. Apparently.
mbx.items.adventurer_backpack.name: Adventurer Backpack
mbx.items.adventurer_helmet.lore: Protects your head from rocks, rain, and regret. Mostly regret.
mbx.items.adventurer_helmet.name: Adventurer Helmet
mbx.items.adventurer_sword.lore: Sharp enough to cut grass. And confidence. Legend says it once poked a dragon.
mbx.items.adventurer_sword.name: Adventurer Sword
mbx.items.alchemists_essence.lore: Distilled from the finest elements, this essence is a true alchemist's delight.
mbx.items.alchemists_essence.name: Alchemist's Essence
mbx.items.ancient_bandage.lore: Dusty, crunchy, and definitely not sterile. Might fix your wounds, or add new ones.
mbx.items.ancient_bandage.name: Ancient Bandage
mbx.items.ancient_herb_extract.lore: From ancient times, this extract holds secrets of the old herbal masters.
mbx.items.ancient_herb_extract.name: Ancient Herb Extract
mbx.items.angel_backpack.lore: Feather-light and majestic, they make you look holy, but won't save you from falling.
mbx.items.angel_backpack.name: Heavenly Wings
mbx.items.angel_helmet.lore: Glows softly above your head, makes you look innocent, even if you're absolutely not.
mbx.items.angel_helmet.name: Heavenly Halo
mbx.items.annoying_buzz_essence.lore: Captured the sound of constant buzzing. Guaranteed to drive you mad.
mbx.items.annoying_buzz_essence.name: Annoying Buzz Essence
mbx.items.ashstone_shard.lore: A tiny piece of volcanic fury, perfect for spicing up your life.
mbx.items.ashstone_shard.name: Ashstone Shard
mbx.items.aspen_carving_block.lore: Softwood for sculptors, easy to shape, ideal for intricate designs.
mbx.items.aspen_carving_block.name: Aspen Carving Block
mbx.items.astral_back.lore: Orbit into style with this planetary backpiece. Gravity? Never heard of it!
mbx.items.astral_back.name: Astral Back
mbx.items.astral_boots.lore: Step into the void with confidence. These boots are made for spacewalking.
mbx.items.astral_boots.name: Astral Boots
mbx.items.astral_chestplate.lore: Feel like a walking galaxy. Armored for battle and fashionably celestial.
mbx.items.astral_chestplate.name: Astral Chestplate
mbx.items.astral_helmet.lore: Protect your noggin while channeling the power of the cosmos. Star-studded!
mbx.items.astral_helmet.name: Astral Helmet
mbx.items.astral_leggings.lore: Strut through the stars with these leggings. Stylish, comfy, and out of this world.
mbx.items.astral_leggings.name: Astral Leggings
mbx.items.avocado.lore: Perfect for a toast, green and creamy, or a secret potion!
mbx.items.avocado.name: Avocado
mbx.items.avocado_toast.lore: When bread and avocados fall in love, this hipster legend is born.
mbx.items.avocado_toast.name: Avocado Toast
mbx.items.babyshark_belt.lore: Worn by the fiercest of tiny predators, this belt makes you feel unstoppable.
mbx.items.babyshark_belt.name: Babyshark Belt
mbx.items.babyshark_boots.lore: Shark-like speed, these boots make you move like a predator.
mbx.items.babyshark_boots.name: Baby Shark Boots
mbx.items.babyshark_chestplate.lore: Armor of the deep, tough and sleek, a predator's choice.
mbx.items.babyshark_chestplate.name: Baby Shark Chestplate
mbx.items.babyshark_helmet.lore: Doo doo doo doo doo doo! This helmet is as cute as it is fierce.
mbx.items.babyshark_helmet.name: Baby Shark Helmet
mbx.items.babyshark_leggings.lore: Leggings of the sea, swift and agile, like a shark's glide.
mbx.items.babyshark_leggings.name: Baby Shark Leggings
mbx.items.babyshark_ring.lore: Tiny but mighty, this ring embodies the spirit of a fierce baby shark.
mbx.items.babyshark_ring.name: Babyshark Ring
mbx.items.babyshark_sword.lore: Bite of a shark, sharp and deadly, a fearsome weapon.
mbx.items.babyshark_sword.name: Baby Shark Sword
mbx.items.bag_of_dried_bananas.lore: For when you're hungry and hate potassium. Crunchy disappointment in every bite.
mbx.items.bag_of_dried_bananas.name: Bag of Dried Bananas
mbx.items.baguette.lore: A formidable weapon, or just a tasty snack, your choice!
mbx.items.baguette.name: Baguette
mbx.items.baking_board.lore: A must-have for bakers, smooth surface for dough, durable and sturdy.
mbx.items.baking_board.name: Baking Board
mbx.items.baking_powder.lore: For fluffy cakes, or unexpected explosions, you decide!
mbx.items.baking_powder.name: Baking powder
mbx.items.bamboo_belly_wrap.lore: Perfect for hiding that extra snack, or ten.
mbx.items.bamboo_belly_wrap.name: Bamboo Belly Wrap
mbx.items.bamboo_sock.lore: Guaranteed to keep your feet fresh, or just really itchy.
mbx.items.bamboo_sock.name: Bamboo Sock
mbx.items.banana.lore: Perfect for slipping foes, a tasty trap waiting to ruin someone's day!
mbx.items.banana.name: Banana
mbx.items.banana_boots.lore: Slip into speed, with these fruity boots, run with style.
mbx.items.banana_boots.name: Banana Boots
mbx.items.banana_bread.lore: The only loaf that bananas dream of being when they grow up.
mbx.items.banana_bread.name: Banana Bread
mbx.items.banana_candy.lore: Peeled from the land of sweets, this candy is so delicious, monkeys beg for mercy.
mbx.items.banana_candy.name: Banana Candy
mbx.items.banana_chestplate.lore: Tough as peel, protects your core, a fruity defense.
mbx.items.banana_chestplate.name: Banana Chestplate
mbx.items.banana_engraved_skull.lore: A small skull, engraved with a banana. Tasty or terrifying?
mbx.items.banana_engraved_skull.name: Banana-Engraved Skull
mbx.items.banana_helmet.lore: Head protection, with a fruity twist, banana tough.
mbx.items.banana_helmet.name: Banana Helmet
mbx.items.banana_leggings.lore: Flexible and strong, these leggings offer banana-powered speed.
mbx.items.banana_leggings.name: Banana Leggings
mbx.items.banana_milkshake.lore: Shake it up with this creamy banana delight, blender-approved chaos.
mbx.items.banana_milkshake.name: Banana Milkshake
mbx.items.banana_ring.lore: Quirky and fun, this ring adds a touch of humor and potassium.
mbx.items.banana_ring.name: Banana Ring
mbx.items.banana_sugar_bowl.lore: When sugar goes bananas, the world spins in a sweet tropical orbit.
mbx.items.banana_sugar_bowl.name: Banana Sugar Bowl
mbx.items.banana_sword.lore: A fruity blade, sharp and sweet, a unique weapon.
mbx.items.banana_sword.name: Banana Sword
mbx.items.baobab_crown.lore: Wear it to feel like the king of very slow-growing trees.
mbx.items.baobab_crown.name: Baobab Crown
mbx.items.basic_agility_belt.lore: Enhances your agility with simple yet effective magic, perfect for swift moves.
mbx.items.basic_agility_belt.name: Basic Agility Belt
mbx.items.basic_agility_boots.lore: Swift as the wind, these boots grant you unmatched agility.
mbx.items.basic_agility_boots.name: Basic Agility Boots
mbx.items.basic_agility_chestplate.lore: Light and strong, boosts your speed, for nimble warriors.
mbx.items.basic_agility_chestplate.name: Basic Agility Chestplate
mbx.items.basic_agility_helmet.lore: Protects your head, without slowing you down, perfect for swift moves.
mbx.items.basic_agility_helmet.name: Basic Agility Helmet
mbx.items.basic_agility_leggings.lore: Run like the wind, these leggings enhance your fleet-footedness.
mbx.items.basic_agility_leggings.name: Basic Agility Leggings
mbx.items.basic_agility_necklace.lore: Simple design that boosts your agility, making you swift and nimble.
mbx.items.basic_agility_necklace.name: Basic Agility Necklace
mbx.items.basic_agility_ring.lore: Boosts your agility with simple magic, making you quick and nimble.
mbx.items.basic_agility_ring.name: Basic Agility Ring
mbx.items.basic_agility_sword.lore: Light as a feather, swift as the wind, strikes before they blink.
mbx.items.basic_agility_sword.name: Basic Agility Sword
mbx.items.basic_intelligence_belt.lore: Boosts your intelligence, making you sharper and smarter with ease.
mbx.items.basic_intelligence_belt.name: Basic Intelligence Belt
mbx.items.basic_intelligence_boots.lore: Step into knowledge, these boots boost your intellectual prowess.
mbx.items.basic_intelligence_boots.name: Basic Intelligence Boots
Guard your wisdom, this chestplate fuels your brilliant strategies.
mbx.items.basic_intelligence_helmet.lore: Think ahead, this helmet sharpens your mental clarity.
mbx.items.basic_intelligence_helmet.name: Basic Intelligence Helmet
mbx.items.basic_intelligence_leggings.lo: Run with insight, these leggings enhance your quick thinking.
mbx.items.basic_intelligence_necklace.lo: Enhances your mind, granting you sharp intellect and keen insights.
mbx.items.basic_intelligence_ring.lore: Enhances your mind, making you smarter and more insightful.
mbx.items.basic_intelligence_ring.name: Basic Intelligence Ring

mbx.items.mm-paint_scream.lore: A face warped by inner terror. The sky bleeds, the soul collapses. Existential dread in a single moment. Brushstrokes echo a silent cry. Alone, but screaming to the world.

mbx.items.mm-paint_son_of_man.lore: A face hidden by a floating apple. Identity veiled in plain sight. A bowler hat, a surreal gaze. Reality bent by quiet absurdity. He stares without showing himself.

mbx.items.ore_seafoam.name: Seafoam Ore

mbx.items.ore_silicate.name: Silicate Ore

mbx.items.ore_silver.name: Silver ore
mbx.items.ore_tin.lore: Soft and shiny, this tin ore is great for making cans.
mbx.items.ore_tin.name: Tin Ore

mbx.items.ore_topaz.name: Topaz Ore
mbx.items.origami_flower_elixir.lore: Folded beauty, this elixir brings the origami flower's charm.
mbx.items.origami_flower_elixir.name: Origami Flower Elixir
mbx.items.owner_remover.description: This candy allows you to remove yourself as the owner of a {{key0}} tool.
mbx.items.owner_remover.name: {{key0}} Forgetfulness candy
mbx.items.panda_headband_of_focus.lore: Soaked in sweat, but shows proof of hard work. Wear it at your own risk.
mbx.items.panda_headband_of_focus.name: Panda Headband of Focus
mbx.items.peppermint_elixir.lore: Cool and fresh, this elixir is perfect for a minty boost.
mbx.items.peppermint_elixir.name: Peppermint Elixir
mbx.items.pet_birb_blue.lore: Sings at 4AM, off-key with zero shame, just to assert dominance.
mbx.items.pet_birb_blue.name: Blue Birb

mbx.items.pet_birb_green.name: Green Birb
mbx.items.pet_birb_orange.lore: Convinced it's on fire, screeches dramatically, and forgets it can fly.
mbx.items.pet_birb_orange.name: Orange Birb

mbx.items.pet_birb_purple.name: Purple Birb
mbx.items.pet_birb_red.lore: Is pure rage, compressed into feathers, and fueled by spite.
mbx.items.pet_birb_red.name: Red Birb
mbx.items.pet_birb_yellow.lore: Thinks everything is exciting, even your boots, especially your boots.
mbx.items.pet_birb_yellow.name: Yellow Birb
mbx.items.pet_black_cat.lore: Cross its path and you'll either get cursed, or just a lot of adorable meows.
mbx.items.pet_black_cat.name: Black Cat

mbx.items.pet_cheese_mouse.name: Cheese Mouse

mbx.items.pet_egg.lore: Warm, round, full of mystery. Could be a dragon. Could be an omelette. Don't sit on it. We tried. It cracks.
mbx.items.pet_egg.name: Pet Egg
mbx.items.pet_fat_shiba.lore: So round, so fluffy, yet runs faster than your average donut-eating knight.
mbx.items.pet_fat_shiba.name: Fat Shiba
mbx.items.pet_fire_dog.lore: With a bark that sizzles, this pup can roast marshmallows with just a wag of its tail.
mbx.items.pet_fire_dog.name: Fire Dog

mbx.items.pet_ginger_fox.lore: Cunning, sly, and absolutely flawless in stealing hearts and the last cookie.
mbx.items.pet_ginger_fox.name: Ginger Fox
mbx.items.pet_halloween_candy.lore: Besides looking horrific, this will spike your blood sugar
mbx.items.pet_halloween_candy.name: Can'tdy
mbx.items.pet_halloween_mummy.lore: He brought some balloons for you. What a nice guy.
mbx.items.pet_halloween_mummy.name: Bummy

mbx.items.pet_hipster_penguin.name: Hipster Penguin
mbx.items.pet_lny_snake.lore: A tiny celestial serpent, floating gracefully behind you, judging your every decision.
mbx.items.pet_lny_snake.name: Lunar Snake
mbx.items.pet_mini_turtle.lore: Slow and steady, but don't be surprised when it outpaces your grandest horse!
mbx.items.pet_mini_turtle.name: Mini Turtle
mbx.items.pet_panda.lore: Master of bamboo smashing, this panda also excels in napping anywhere, anytime.
mbx.items.pet_panda.name: Panda
mbx.items.pet_polar_bear.lore: Cold, fluffy, and dangerous. Cuddle it at your own risk, but watch out for snowballs!
mbx.items.pet_polar_bear.name: Polar Bear

mbx.items.piece_blue_starfish.name: Piece of blue starfish
mbx.items.piece_orange_starfish.lore: Orange fragment, of a sea star, shines brightly.
mbx.items.piece_orange_starfish.name: Piece of orange starfish

mbx.items.treasure_mythic.lore: Mythic rewards await, those brave enough to seek them.
mbx.items.treasure_mythic.name: Mythic Treasure
mbx.items.treasure_rare.lore: Hidden gems await, this holds rare delights.
mbx.items.treasure_rare.name: Rare Treasure
mbx.items.treasure_uncommon.lore: Better than common, might find something worthwhile here.
mbx.items.treasure_uncommon.name: Uncommon Treasure
mbx.items.valentine_letter.lore: A letter filled with mystery, could hold love, fortune, or absolute chaos.
mbx.items.valentine_letter.name: Valentiny Letter
mbx.items.vein_axe_cake.description: This axe breaks multiple logs in one hit
mbx.items.vein_axe_cake.lore: Crafted from the finest bakeries, this cake is both delicious and deadly.
mbx.items.vein_axe_cake.name: Axelicious
mbx.items.vein_axe_chop.description: This axe breaks multiple logs in one hit
mbx.items.vein_axe_chop.lore: Belonging to a beaver with a single motto: 'Chop chop!'
mbx.items.vein_axe_chop.name: Chop's Chop
mbx.items.vein_axe_fortune.description: This axe breaks multiple logs in one hit
mbx.items.vein_axe_fortune.lore: Shiny and golden, this axe promises wealth with every chop. Just don't get greedy!
mbx.items.vein_axe_fortune.name: Fortunaxe
mbx.items.vein_axe_mushroom.description: This axe breaks multiple mushroom blocks in one hit
mbx.items.vein_axe_mushroom.lore: Sprouting from enchanted spores, this axe is the ultimate fungus foe.
mbx.items.vein_axe_mushroom.name: Shroominator
mbx.items.vein_axe_nether.description: This axe breaks multiple logs in one hit
mbx.items.vein_axe_nether.lore: Forged in the fiery depths of the Nether, it cuts through wood like a hot knife.
mbx.items.vein_axe_nether.name: Chopocalypse Axe
mbx.items.vein_axe_relax.description: This axe breaks multiple logs in one hit
mbx.items.vein_axe_relax.lore: Infused with chill vibes and reggae rhythms, it's the wisest way to unwind.
mbx.items.vein_axe_relax.name: Rel Axe
mbx.items.vein_axe_ruby.description: This axe breaks multiple logs in one hit
mbx.items.vein_axe_ruby.lore: Chop trees so fine, they'll think they were cut by a jeweler.
mbx.items.vein_axe_ruby.name: Ruby Axe
mbx.items.vein_pickaxe_pickaboo.descript: This pickaxe breaks multiple ores in one hit
mbx.items.vein_pickaxe_pickaboo.lore: Ores vanish faster than your guildmates. Now you see 'em...
mbx.items.vein_pickaxe_pickaboo.name: Pickaboo
mbx.items.vein_pickaxe_ruby.description: This pickaxe breaks multiple ores in one hit
mbx.items.vein_pickaxe_ruby.lore: Mine with such finesse, the ores won't know what hit them.
mbx.items.vein_pickaxe_ruby.name: Ruby Pickaxe
mbx.items.venomous_cobra_s_head.lore: Severed, yet still dangerous. Drips venom, handle with extreme caution.
mbx.items.venomous_cobra_s_head.name: Venomous Cobra's Head
mbx.items.venomous_mushroom_juice.lore: A dangerous concoction. Great for poisoning enemies, or accidentally yourself.
mbx.items.venomous_mushroom_juice.name: Venomous Mushroom Juice
mbx.items.venomous_mushroom_juice_bottle: Best kept sealed, or you'll regret it. Handle with care.
mbx.items.vented_steam_valve.lore: All out of steam. Now just a weird paperweight. Not much use anymore.
mbx.items.vented_steam_valve.name: Vented Steam Valve
mbx.items.very_heavy_boots.lore: Boots like anvils stomp with power don't expect to run.
mbx.items.very_heavy_boots.name: Very Heavy Boots
mbx.items.very_heavy_chestplate.lore: Armor of a tank impenetrable defense speed not included.
mbx.items.very_heavy_chestplate.name: Very Heavy Chestplate
mbx.items.very_heavy_helmet.lore: Solid as a rock protects your noggin moves at a snail's pace.
mbx.items.very_heavy_helmet.name: Very Heavy Helmet
mbx.items.very_heavy_leggings.lore: Leggings of steel strength and durability walking workout.
mbx.items.very_heavy_leggings.name: Very Heavy Leggings
mbx.items.wagyu_steak.lore: A cut above the rest, so luxurious it should wear a crown.
mbx.items.wagyu_steak.name: Wagyu Steak
mbx.items.walnut.lore: Find wisdom inside, crack it open, a nutty treasure.
mbx.items.walnut.name: Walnut
mbx.items.walnut_oil.lore: Nutty and rich, perfect for cooking, from walnut trees.
mbx.items.walnut_oil.name: Walnut Oil
mbx.items.wasabi.lore: Just looking at it makes your eyes water. Spice with caution.
mbx.items.wasabi.name: Wasabi
mbx.items.watering_can_magic.lore: Infused with magical waters, it nourishes plants beyond the realm of imagination.
mbx.items.watering_can_magic.name: Magic Watering Can
mbx.items.watering_can_simple.lore: Perfect for budding gardeners, this can quenches plants with modest charm.
mbx.items.watering_can_simple.name: Simple Watering Can
mbx.items.wedding_costume_boots.lore: Too big to walk properly, perfect for tripping on your own commitments.
mbx.items.wedding_costume_boots.name: Oversized Wedding Shoes
mbx.items.wedding_costume_chestplate.lor: Drapes like a royal robe, feels like a weighted blanket, especially after saying 'I do'.
mbx.items.wedding_costume_leggings.lore: One size fits none, held up by pure hope, and maybe some suspenders.
mbx.items.wedding_costume_leggings.name: Oversized Wedding Pants
mbx.items.wedding_dress_back.lore: So long and flowy, you'll need an army just to carry the train.
mbx.items.wedding_dress_back.name: Oversized Wedding Gown
mbx.items.wedding_dress_boots.lore: Designed for elegance, engineered for pain, guaranteed to make you regret life choices.
mbx.items.wedding_dress_boots.name: Oversized Wedding Heels
mbx.items.wedding_dress_chestplate.lore: Tight enough to reshape your ribs, loose enough to pretend it's comfortable, fashion over oxygen, as always.
mbx.items.wedding_dress_chestplate.name: Oversized Wedding Bodice
mbx.items.wedding_dress_helmet.lore: A delicate touch of mystery, blocks your vision completely, just like love sometimes.
mbx.items.wedding_dress_helmet.name: Oversized Wedding Veil
mbx.items.wedding_dress_leggings.lore: Billowy, extravagant, and slightly impractical for movement, but at least it hides nervous knees.
mbx.items.wedding_dress_leggings.name: Oversized Wedding Skirt
mbx.items.wedding_ring.lore: A beautiful circle of love, or a shiny reminder of legally binding decisions.
mbx.items.wedding_ring.name: Wedding Ring
mbx.items.white_pokebowl.lore: Pure and simple, a bowl of delight, with a touch of class.
mbx.items.white_pokebowl.name: White Pokebowl
mbx.items.white_wood_plaque.lore: Pure and bright, a sign of distinction, from pale wood.
mbx.items.white_wood_plaque.name: White Wood Plaque
mbx.items.white_wood_superplaque.lore: Elegant and grand, crafted with care, a prestigious award.
mbx.items.white_wood_superplaque.name: White Wood Superplaque
mbx.items.wilted_yellow_petal.lore: Smells faintly of lemon. Droopy and sad. Not worth much.
mbx.items.wilted_yellow_petal.name: Wilted Yellow Petal
mbx.items.wise_leatherhead_belt.lore: Crafted for the wise, this leather belt grants sage-like knowledge.
mbx.items.wise_leatherhead_belt.name: Wise Leatherhead Belt
mbx.items.wise_leatherhead_boots.lore: Step with precision on the gridiron of life wisdom in every stride.
mbx.items.wise_leatherhead_boots.name: Wise Leatherhead Boots
mbx.items.wise_leatherhead_chestplate.lo: Armor of intellect tough as pigskin strategy in every play.
mbx.items.wise_leatherhead_helmet.lore: Headgear of a sage stitched like a football wisdom on the field.
mbx.items.wise_leatherhead_helmet.name: Wise Leatherhead Helmet
mbx.items.wise_leatherhead_leggings.lore: Run like a quarterback with leather strength and sage's speed.
mbx.items.wise_leatherhead_leggings.name: Wise Leatherhead Leggings
mbx.items.wise_leatherhead_sword.lore: Infused with ancient wisdom, it strikes when necessary and rests when wise.
mbx.items.wise_leatherhead_sword.name: Wise Leatherhead Sword
mbx.items.wither_phantom_potion.lore: A potion so haunting, even phantoms fear its power.
mbx.items.wither_phantom_potion.name: Wither Phantom Potion
mbx.items.workshop.description: This workshop can be placed on your island.
mbx.items.workshop.name: {{key0}} {{key1}} Workshop
mbx.items.worn_out_blue_bandana.lore: Been through many battles. Now mostly a rag. Still has some fight left in it.
mbx.items.worn_out_blue_bandana.name: Worn-Out Blue Bandana
mbx.items.wrasse_wraps.lore: Wrapped up tight, with flavors galore, a handy snack!
mbx.items.wrasse_wraps.name: Wrasse Wraps
mbx.items.wrinkled_scroll_fragment.lore: Too old to read. But looks ancient. Definitely belongs in a museum.
mbx.items.wrinkled_scroll_fragment.name: Wrinkled Scroll Fragment
mbx.items.xmas_bandana_blue.lore: Stolen from a very stylish penguin. Wearing it might make you feel cool, but not as cool as the penguin was.
mbx.items.xmas_bandana_blue.name: Blue Bandana
mbx.items.xmas_bandana_green.lore: Recovered from a penguin eco-warrior. Said to grant camouflage, but only if you're in a forest.
mbx.items.xmas_bandana_green.name: Green Bandana
mbx.items.xmas_bandana_red.lore: Ripped from the flippers of a fearless penguin. Bold, bright, and makes a statement: 'I stole this, and I'm proud.'
mbx.items.xmas_bandana_red.name: Red Bandana
mbx.items.xmas_bandana_yellow.lore: Liberated from a sunny penguin’s wardrobe. Wearing it might attract attention, mostly from other jealous penguins.
mbx.items.xmas_bandana_yellow.name: Yellow Bandana
mbx.items.xmas_blue_candy.lore: Chilly and sweet, it tastes like a winter breeze in candy form. Best before last snowfall.
mbx.items.xmas_blue_candy.name: Blue Candy
mbx.items.xmas_confetti_cannon.lore: Blast your way into the festivities! Comes with a warning: 'May cause excessive joy.'
mbx.items.xmas_confetti_cannon.name: Confetti Cannon
mbx.items.xmas_gingerbread.lore: Run, run, as fast as you can! But don’t trip—this snack is as crunchy as it is cheeky.
mbx.items.xmas_gingerbread.name: Gingerbread Man
mbx.items.xmas_green_candy.lore: Refreshingly minty, with a twist. Legend says it boosts your agility, or just your need to floss.
mbx.items.xmas_green_candy.name: Green Candy
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_backpack.lore: Loaded with ironic essentials. Perfect for carrying vinyls, avocado toast, and fragile egos.
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_backpack.name: Hipster Backpack
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_belt.lore: Keeps your pants up, and your credibility down. Handwoven by someone cooler than you.
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_belt.name: Hipster Belt
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_boots.lore: Stomps out mainstream trends. Ideal for wading through judgmental coffee shop crowds.
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_boots.name: Hipster Boots
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_chestplate.lore: Deflects criticism effortlessly. Handcrafted from artisanal irony. Pairs well with a latte.
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_chestplate.name: Hipster Chestplate
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_helmet.lore: Protects your head, but not your questionable opinions. Custom-fitted with a beanie aesthetic.
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_helmet.name: Hipster Helmet
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_leggings.lore: So tight, they squeeze out all traces of originality. Comfortable, yet fashionably aloof.
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_leggings.name: Hipster Leggings
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_necklace.lore: A statement piece that says, 'I was into this before you.' Comes with a free eye roll.
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_necklace.name: Hipster Necklace
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_ring.lore: Circular and ironic. Perfect for proposing to someone else's individuality.
mbx.items.xmas_hipster_ring.name: Hipster Ring
mbx.items.xmas_present_big.lore: Huge, festive, and promising. What's inside? Definitely not the meaning of Christmas.
mbx.items.xmas_present_big.name: Big {{key0}} Present
mbx.items.xmas_present_medium.lore: A gift wrapped in mystery, because nobody really knows what's inside.
mbx.items.xmas_present_medium.name: Medium {{key0}} Present
mbx.items.xmas_present_small.lore: Pristine and pure as fresh snow. Inside? The kind of gift you pretend to love.
mbx.items.xmas_present_small.name: Small {{key0}} Present
mbx.items.xmas_red_candy.lore: Spicy, sweet, and slightly dangerous. Perfect for those who enjoy a fiery holiday treat.
mbx.items.xmas_red_candy.name: Red Candy
mbx.items.xmas_sugarcane.lore: Sweeter than a snowflake, and sharp enough to double as a festive toothpick.
mbx.items.xmas_sugarcane.name: Christmas Sugarcane
mbx.items.xmas_ugly_pullover.lore: So ugly, it loops back around to being fashionable. Guaranteed to make grandma jealous.
mbx.items.xmas_ugly_pullover.name: Ugly Pullover
mbx.items.xmas_yellow_candy.lore: Zesty and cheerful, this candy radiates positivity, or just a sugar rush.
mbx.items.xmas_yellow_candy.name: Yellow Candy
mbx.items.yarrow_tonic.lore: Heal and protect, this tonic uses yarrow's power.
mbx.items.yarrow_tonic.name: Yarrow Tonic
mbx.items.yellow_cocktail.lore: Sunny and bright, a sip of happiness, in every drop.
mbx.items.yellow_cocktail.name: Yellow cocktail
mbx.items.yellow_macaron.lore: Golden delight, melts on your tongue, a sunlit treat.
mbx.items.yellow_macaron.name: Yellow macaron
mbx.items.yeti_plush.lore: A soft toy, reminds you of home. Also worth a good price.
mbx.items.yeti_plush.name: Yeti Plush
mbx.items.yew_resin.lore: Useful and sticky, a natural adhesive, from yew trees.
mbx.items.yew_resin.name: Yew Resin
mbx.items.zander_filet.lore: Cunning and tasty, a filet to pursue, worth every bite.
mbx.items.zander_filet.name: Zander Filet
